attributes.action: Cut the times to get an MRI Scan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have just been told by my local hospital,the Luton & Dunstable,that I have to wait 11 weeks just to get an MRI Scan.
         I have now been off work since the 9th July 2007,with a problem the Specialist I`m seeing doesnt have a Diagnosis,so thats why I need an MRI Scan.
